2_Old Republic/Ebon Hawk/EbonHawk Graphic_Single (18,18) (0,0,0) True
The Ebon Hawk was a Dynamic-class freighter and a smuggler ship. It was well-known throughout the galaxy. The ship was heavily modified over the course of its life, to the point that it was difficult to determine its origins. With its extremely powerful hyperdrive, the ship was believed to be the fastest ship in the Outer Rim Territories.

Hammerhead Cruiser
Graphic_Multi (75,75) (0,0,0)
The Hammerhead-class cruiser was a type of warship used by the Republic Navy. One of the most successful warship designs in galactic history, the Hammerhead-class would still see use in sector defense forces millennia after its introduction and would inspire many later ship designs.

Aurek Strikefighter True
Graphic_Single (7,7) (0,0,0) True
The Aurek-class tactical strikefighter, also known as the original A-wing, was a Republic starfighter, several models of which were used in the Old Sith Wars, the Great Galactic War, the New Sith Wars, and even until the final generation of the Republic.

The X-70B Phantom-class prototype was a prototype starship of the reconstituted Sith Empire used by Imperial Intelligence. The sleek appearance of the X-70B Phantom was designed to pass for a civilian luxury shuttle, despite its array of hidden components. Its bridge was shielded by the forward armor plating, and was equipped with advanced, precision flight instruments.
